alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Wakulla, northwestern Jefferson and Leon Counties in the Florida Big Bend as well as southeastern Grady and southern Thomas Counties in Southwestern Georgia through 745 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Thomasville to 10 miles east of Tallahassee to 8 miles east of St. Marks. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph in thunderstorms. Outflow wind gusts to 50 mph before storms arrive. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Thomasville, Tallahassee, Cairo, Crawfordville, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Cody, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Iamonia and Eight Mile Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
